info.author: Tobias Ammann
info.description:
silo
====

A very simple to use logging and profiling library.

from silo import silo

silo('info.')
silo('fail!')
silo('# debug')
silo('(channel) asdf asdf.')
silo('event {event_id} dispatched.')

@silo('# running foo({name}) returns {.}')
def foo(name):
    print 'Hello,', name.upper()
    return len(name)
info.name: silo
info.summary: A very simple to use logging and profiling library.
